short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the Newtab page with an image and information on a random FRC team

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension replaces the new tab page with an image of a random FRC team's robot from The  Blue Alliance and overlays information like season epa, team number, and team name (which can be hidden on hover) from Statbotics. It can be configured to only show teams that have an image, or to show a custom default background image for those that don't. You can select between multiple season for the robots to display, and you can put in event keys from The Blue Alliance to only show robots who competed/are competing at those competitions. The settings page can be access from a gear icon in the bottom right corner of the new tab page.
